original: 漢獻帝不願再受曹操掌控，意圖奪回實權，血書密詔於衣帶，暗中命國舅召集人馬欲除去曹操。
text: Emperor Xian of the Han Dynasty did not want to be controlled by Cao Cao anymore, intending to regain the real power, the blood book was secretly enshrined in the belt, secretly ordered the uncle of the country to summon people to remove Cao Cao.
